ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 1514, The Declaration on the Granting of Independence to Colonial Countries and Peoples.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 1514, The Declaration on the Granting of Independence to Colonial Countries and Peoples, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 1514, The Declaration on the Granting of Independence to Colonial Countries and Peoples.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
